price: (erga adabaatii) gorfamuun akkamitti isaaniif jiraata, Odoo ergamaan ifa baasaan isaanitti dhufee jiruu?
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
